response.overview: “Last Call” is a fantasy short about Claudia Chow, a fast riding motorcycle rebel who crashes into a mystical Chinese snake woman inside a magical bamboo forest. Claudia is simultaneously terrified and turned on by this collision as her encounters with the snake woman weaves in and out of her consciousness. The more Claudia tries to ignore the snake woman’s calling, the more she is tormented by her destructive behavior.
response.title: Last Call
